title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 49
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 49 (Alcoholism, Drug Abuse 4):

We have 31 titles here:

-  Alcohol and the Liver (HCSP Fact Sheet, 2012)

-  Blair - The Temperance Movement; or, the Conflict between Man and Alcohol (1888)

-  Daley & Marlatt - Overcoming Your Alcohol or Drug Problem; Effective Recovery Strategies, 2e (2006)

-  Dasgupta & Langman (Eds.) - Pharmacogenomics of Alcohol and Drugs of Abuse (2012)

-  Grant & Leverton (Eds.) - Working Together to Reduce Harmful Drinking (2010)

-  Hedblom - Last Call; Alcoholism and Recovery (2007)

-  Hillman - The Chemical Muse; Drug Use and the Roots of Western Civilization (2008)

-  Lyman & Potter - Drugs in Society; Causes, Concepts, and Control, 6e (2011)

-  Maltzman - Alcoholism; Its Treatment and Mistreatment (2008)

-  Miller - The Encyclopedia of Addictive Drugs (2002)

-  Miller (Ed.) - Interventions for Addiction; Comprehensive Addictive Behaviors and Disorders, Vol. 3 (2013)

-  Mistral (Ed.) - Emerging Perspectives on Substance Misuse (2013)

-  Obembe - Practical Skills and Clinical Management of Alcoholism and Drug Addiction (2012)

-  Ouimette & Brown (Eds.) - Trauma and Substance Abuse; Causes, Consequences, and Treatment of Comorbid Disorders (2003)

-  Pagliaro & Pagliaro - Handbook of Child and Adolescent Drug and Substance Abuse (2012)

-  Pearcy - Sex, Drugs, Ratt & Roll; My Life in Rock (2013)

-  Phillips & Tervalon (Eds.) - The Cocaine Chronicles (2011)

-  Porter & Teich (Eds.) - Drugs and Narcotics in History (1995)

-  Preciado - Testo Junkie; Sex, Drugs, and Biopolitics in the Pharmacopornographic Era (2013)

-  Rapaka (Eds.) - Pharmacokinetics, Metabolism, and Pharmaceutics of Drugs of Abuse (1997)

-  Reiss - We Sell Drugs; the Alchemy of US Empire (2014)

-  Rogers (Ed.) - Substance Use and Abuse (2011)

-  Rosner (Ed.) - Clinical Handbook of Adolescent Addiction (2013)

-  Ross et al (Eds.) - What Is Addiction (2010)

-  Rotgers & Davis - Treating Alcohol Problems (2006)

-  Saitz (Ed.) - Addressing Unhealthy Alcohol Use in Primary Care (2013)

-  Schiller - The Road Through Wonderland; Surviving John Holmes (2010)

-  Sheff - Beautiful Boy; a Father's Journey through His Son's Addiction (2008)

-  Siple - Eating for Recovery; the Essential Nutrition Plan to Reverse the Physical Damage of Alcoholism (2008)

-  Smith - Drinking History; Fifteen Turning Points in the Making of American Beverages (2013)

-  Sommer & Spanagel (Eds.) - Behavioral Neurobiology of Alcohol Addiction (2013)
